# [0.5.0] - 2017-11-19
### Added
- Debug setting

# [0.4.0] - 2017-09-03
### Added
- Support for perl+mojolicious

# [0.3.0] - 2017-02-11
### Fixed
- Support for PHP

# [0.2.0] - 2016-01-06
### Added
- Support for fixed severity levels
- Changelog
